That sounds like a great idea! Trying out new vegan restaurants, especially ones that specialize in cuisines you love, is always exciting!

Since you've heard great things about their vegan pad thai and curry dishes, I think it's definitely worth giving them a shot. Here are a few tips to keep in mind:

1. **Check their menu online**: Before you go, take a look at their menu online to ensure they have options that appeal to you. You can also check if they have any specials or seasonal dishes.
2. **Call ahead or ask about cross-contamination**: If you have any concerns about food allergies or cross-contamination, consider calling ahead to ask about their preparation procedures.
3. **Be open-minded**: Trying new restaurants can be an adventure, so be open to trying new flavors and dishes. You might discover a new favorite!
4. **Don't be afraid to ask questions**: If you have questions about the menu or ingredients, don't hesitate to ask your server. They can provide valuable insights and help you make informed choices.
5. **Enjoy the experience**: Remember to relax and enjoy the experience! Trying new restaurants is all about exploring new flavors and having fun.

By following these tips, you'll be well-prepared for a great dining experience at the new vegan Thai place. Who knows, you might just discover your new favorite spot!

Have a fantastic time, and I hope you enjoy every bite of that vegan pad thai and curry!
